column2: text
'For God so loved the world that He gave His only Son.'
'The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.'
'In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.'
'test'
'Out of the mouth of children and infants* you have brought forth praise.'
Let us not sleep on as the rest do* but let us stay awake and keep our senses.
'When [Jehovah] says something* will he not do it'
'Where are your stings* Odeath'
'By God we will gain power.'
'Give thanks for everything.'
'Keep asking in faith* not doubting at all.'
'[Loves] flames are a blazing fire* the flame of Jah. Surging waters cannot extinguish love* nor can rivers wash it away.'
'Do not be afraid.'
'Make sure of all things.'
'He has revealed his confidential matter to his servants.'
'Let us continue loving one another* because love is from God'
'Throw off every weight.'
'Do not let your adornment be external.'
'Listen intently to me* and eat what is good* and you will find great delight in what is truly rich.'
'The one slow to anger is better than a mighty man* and the one controlling his temper than one conquering a city.'
'You will appoint them as princes in all the earth.'
'By undeserved kindness you have been saved.'
'Be in subjection to the superior authorities.'
'Jehovahs spirit empowered him.'
'This is according to the eternal purpose that he formed in connection with the Christ* Jesus our Lord.'
'If Jehovah had not been my helper* I would soon have perished.'
'The result of humility and the fear of Jehovah is riches and glory and life.'
'Overlook an offense.'
'Women should adorn themselves in appropriate dress* ...in the way that is proper for women professing devotion to God.'
'Let us rejoice* based on hope of the glory of God.'
'The peace of God that surpasses all understanding will guard your hearts and your mental powers.'
'Our Father in the heavens* let your name be sanctified.'
'With what will I repay Jehovah for all the good he has done for me'
'I have approved you'
text
For God so loved the world that He gave His only Son.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.
